question: According to a report by New World Wealth, this Indian city has ranked 12th out of 15 wealthiest cities globally.
explanation: According to a report by New World Wealth, Mumbai has ranked 12th out of 15 wealthiest cities globally. With USD 950 billion total wealth, Mumbai is the only India city to feature in the list of 15 wealthiest cities. Mumbai is home to 28 billionaires (individuals with USD 1 billion or more in net assets). Mumbai is regarded as the economic hub of India. It is also home to the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), the 12th largest stock exchange in the world. With USD 3 trillion total wealth, New York has topped the list of 15 wealthiest cities.
